xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/961541-Betty Danger: Vice Cop 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1LlZmD6Zyr4KfL75A0yRohRy18N.jpg Betty (August Arroya) was the wildest girl at the Police Academy, ready to take on anything - or anyone. So along with her diploma, she earned quite the reputation, and a nickname to go with it: Betty Danger. Her friends always said she'd either become a Vice Detective, or get picked up by one, so when she received her promotion to join the Vice Squad, she knew she found her true calling. Betty Danger: Vice Cop
